TopicTitle: I would like to take a minute...

Articles.Content:
Hey there let me introduce myself. I'm Ed, AKA 3viL, and have been lurking around here for a few months. Finally made an account and figured I'd join in on the shenanigans. Got the game as a gift from my dad and I have logged a few hundred hours since Dec. One fine piece of software you have here. Absolute genius.

-3viL
Welcome to the friendliest online community make your self at home.
